Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Scrappy \Scrap"py\, a. Consisting of scraps; fragmentary; lacking unity or consistency; as, a scrappy lecture. [1913 Webster]
A dreadfully scrappy dinner. --Thackeray. [1913 Webster]
scrappy adj : full of fighting spirit; "a scrappy admiral" [also: {scrappiest}, {scrappier}]
